channel.title: Data Science on Adrian Zucco
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on Adrian Zucco

item.title: Introduction to Complex Systems Approaches in Public Health
item.author: youremail@example.com (Adrian Zucco)
item.description: PhD course to be held in May 2025. The course places great emphasis on the practical application of the Health Complexity Framework, which serves as a fundamental tool for conducting complexity research in the field of public health. Lecturer on pattern recognition in epidemiology and public health.

item.title: Data Doctors
item.author: youremail@example.com (Adrian Zucco)
item.description: Founder of a decentralized community for learning Data Science among medical practictioners at Righospitalet. I created multiple open-access workshops to teach the basics of Data Science in R.
